dcterms:description: The CO3D dataset is utilized for training and evaluating methods for estimating relative poses of two views of the same object, leveraging object priors.
dcterms:title: CO3D

dcterms:creator: L. Downs
A. Francis
N. Koenig
B. Kinman
R. Hickman
K. Reymann
T. B. McHugh
V. Vanhoucke
dcterms:description: The GSO dataset contains high-quality 3D scanned household items, used for evaluating the robustness of pose estimation methods under extreme viewpoint changes.
dcterms:title: GSO

dcterms:creator: V. Jampani
K.-K. Maninis
A. Engelhardt
A. Karpur
K. Truong

H. Zhou
dcterms:description: The Navi dataset provides category-agnostic image collections with high-quality 3D shape and pose annotations, facilitating the evaluation of pose estimation methods.
dcterms:title: Navi

dcterms:creator: L. Downs
A. Francis
N. Koenig
B. Kinman
R. Hickman
K. Reymann
T. B. McHugh
V. Vanhoucke
dcterms:description: The Rotated GSO dataset is derived from the GSO dataset, featuring images of 3D scanned household items with added in-plane rotations to test robustness in pose estimation.
dcterms:title: Rotated GSO

dcterms:creator: V. Jampani

dcterms:description: The Rotated Navi dataset is a variant of the Navi dataset, including images with added in-plane rotations to evaluate the robustness of pose estimation methods.
dcterms:title: Rotated Navi
